document.full_text: higher car prices and a shortage of fuel-efficient vehicles likely threw a roadblock in the u.s. auto industry's recovery path in may, when the japan crisis had its biggest impact on u.s. sales so far.
document.title: price hikes, fewer cars likely hurt auto sales
lines_and_colors: higher car prices and a shortage of fuel-efficient vehicles likely threw a roadblock in the u.s. auto industry's recovery path in may, when the japan crisis had its biggest impact on u.s. sales so far.
